TopicTitle: Need a recomendation for audio modifying software. Upcoming project.

Articles.Content: Hey all, I was trying to look for a free audio modifimication software that is able to speed up/slow down audio as well as play it backwards. Is there such a program? I need it for an upcoming video project
Audacity may work best, and it's free.
Yeah, when I need to edit audio Ive always use Audacity. Great program.

Funnily enough, it would seem I already have Audacity on this PC

Guess I never learned how to work it! Thanks a million you two, I shall be looking into it.
